attributes.action: Give Victims of Crime the Right To Appeal Against Decisions Made By the CPS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often in serious cases; soft sentences are given out by the CPS. The victims have no rights to review these soft sentences. When there is a lack of common sense the victims should be able to appeal against the sentence. If successful the offender should recieve a harsher penalty.
